description.en:
BeautyK aims to complete the block chain-based encryption monetary economic ecosystem through actual application and expansion as a means of exchanging with the real economy, which is the next step of the decentralized distributed ledger hypothesis verification that Bitcoin proposed for the first time.

it will connect beauty industry consumers and content creators with product producers and distributors, provide relevant stakeholders with transparent information so that they can use the information effectively, and expand beauty services using blockchain technology so that more people in the world can use it.

By combining Big Data and AI Technology, it will provide users with care service, style/fashion trend suggestion service, and provide a data platform where companies in the beauty industry can utilize in product planning, development and marketing by constructing an ecosystem where users can directly evaluate the level of content and accuracy of information and curate them.
